    Method
    Description
    void
    ProjectController.assignProject(Student student, Database studentDatabase, Project project, Database projectDatabase)
    Assigns a project to a student, updates the project status to ALLOCATED and updates the project database.
    void

    Creates a new project and adds it to the project database.
    void
    ProjectController.deregisterProject(Student student, Database studentDatabase, Project project, Database projectDatabase)
    Deregisters the project from the given student and updates the project and student databases accordingly.
